channel.title: CVE Feed for NetApp -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NetApp -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-5491|2024-09-16T17:08:32.691Z -- netapp -- clustered%20data%20ontap
item.description: Clustered Data ONTAP versions prior to 9.1P15 and 9.3 prior to 9.3P7 are susceptible to a vulnerability which discloses sensitive information to an unauthenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2018-5490|2024-09-16T17:22:52.478Z -- netapp -- clustered%20data%20ontap
item.description: Read-Only export policy rules are not correctly enforced in Clustered Data ONTAP 8.3 Release Candidate versions and therefore may allow more than "read-only" access from authenticated SMBv2 and SMBv3 clients. This behavior has been resolved in the GA release. Customers running prior release candidates (RCs) are requested to update their systems to the NetApp Data ONTAP 8.3 GA release.

item.title: CVE-2017-15519|2024-09-16T18:23:26.580Z -- netapp -- snapcenter
item.description: Versions of SnapCenter 2.0 through 3.0.1 allow unauthenticated remote attackers to view and modify backup related data via the Plug-in for NAS File Services. All users are urged to move to version 3.0.1 and perform the mitigation steps or upgrade to 4.0 following the product documentation.

item.title: CVE-2024-21993|2024-07-11T15:12:49.194Z -- netapp -- snapcenter
item.description: SnapCenter versions prior to 5.0p1 are susceptible to a vulnerability which could allow an authenticated attacker to discover plaintext credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-21988|2024-06-14T21:37:46.450Z -- netapp -- storagegrid%20%28formerly%20storagegrid%20webscale%29
item.description: StorageGRID (formerly StorageGRID Webscale) versions prior to 11.7.0.9 and 11.8.0.5 are susceptible to disclosure of sensitive information via complex MiTM attacks due to a vulnerability in the SSH cryptographic implementation.

item.title: CVE-2024-21990|2024-06-04T17:37:30.646Z -- netapp -- ontap%20select%20deploy%20administration%20utility
item.description: ONTAP Select Deploy administration utility versions 9.12.1.x, 9.13.1.x and 9.14.1.x contain hard-coded credentials that could allow an attacker to view Deploy configuration information and modify the account credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-21989|2024-04-17T19:32:34.598Z -- netapp -- ontap%20select%20deploy%20administration%20utility
item.description: ONTAP Select Deploy administration utility versions 9.12.1.x, 9.13.1.x and 9.14.1.x are susceptible to a vulnerability which when successfully exploited could allow a read-only user to escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-21988|2024-06-15T19:53:11.020Z -- netapp -- storagegrid%20%28formerly%20storagegrid%20webscale%29
item.description: StorageGRID (formerly StorageGRID Webscale) versions prior to 11.7.0.9 and 11.8.0.5 are susceptible to disclosure of sensitive information via complex MiTM attacks due to a vulnerability in the SSH cryptographic implementation.

item.title: CVE-2024-21993|2024-07-09T21:26:03.404Z -- netapp -- snapcenter
item.description: SnapCenter versions prior to 5.0p1 are susceptible to a vulnerability which could allow an authenticated attacker to discover plaintext credentials.

item.description: ONTAP Select Deploy administration utility versions 9.12.1.x, 9.13.1.x and 9.14.1.x are susceptible to a vulnerability which when successfully exploited could allow a read-only user to escalate their privileges.
